name: The Graph
description: The Graph powers blockchain apps by indexing decentralized data from top chains like Ethereum, Solana, and more. It's the go-to source for smooth access to web3 information.

name: Compound
description: Compound Labs is a blockchain platform where they help clients monetize and borrow crypto tokens for various financial applications, leveraging tech to manage digital assets efficiently.

name: Syndicate
description: Syndicate is paving a path for a community-owned future by creating decentralized solutions that empower people to take control, collaborate, and build vibrant, inclusive asset ecosystems.

name: LootRush
description: A privacy-friendly platform for you to have fun with all gaming NFTs

name: Blackwing Finance
description: Blackwing Finance offers liquidation-free margin trading platform that works seamlessly with any asset.

name: Inco
description: Inco is the go-to for privacy on Web3. Using fully homomorphic encryption and Ethereum security, Inco powers secure dApps and confidential blockchain solutions fueling next-gen adoption.

name: Particle
description: A decentralized leverage trading protocol permissionless for any digital asset.

name: Spindl (Acq. Coinbase)
description: Spindl offers smart attribution tools for web3, empowering companies to navigate data easily and optimize their strategies for smarter, data-driven decisions in the digital arena.
